item.title: Limera
item.description: LIMERA: Professional camera for easy storage LIMERA is a portable camera that proposes a new method of camera storage without compromising professionalty, It implements a swivel body that allows the camera to be transformed into a smaller cylinder which is much easier to store in bags and carry around. Professional cameras are big, bulky and have a weird shape, whereas LIMERA cuts the bulk of raditional cameres.The project originates from my hoby ofphotography, where l find traditional cameras hard to fit in my back pack.
